description:
LoadTest library for c# written loadtest scenarios.
Visit project website for documentation.
Easy-to-use, Customizable, Light-weight and Fast.
WIP Library: Namespace and project name might still change, once proper name is decided.
releaseNotes:
0.1.6.11
* Fixed Null-ref error when LoadRunnerEngine is disposed without calling .Run()

0.1.6.10 
* Exposed LoadRunnerEngine.TestBeginTimeUtc 
* Exposed LoadRunnerEngine.TestDuration 
* Exposed ITestContext.GetErrors() 

0.1.6.9 
* Documented IResultsAggregator's & LoadRunnerParameters 
* Removed ThreadHistogramResultsAggregator (new HistogramResultsAggregator(r => r.ThreadId); does the same) 
* Added TimeHistogramResultsAggregator optional parameter to provide secondary aggregation function 
* Added TimeHistogramResultsAggregator optional parameter to post-process GroupByKey before returning. 
* Added TimeHistogramResultsAggregator property to override GetTimeValue, on which TimeAggregation is based. 
* Added LoadTestScenarioValidator class (to help develop & debug ILoadTestScenario) 
* Added IIterationMetadata (Covers ITestContext and TestContextResult) (Contains ThreadId, ThreadIterationId, GlobalITerationId, UserData) 


0.1.6.1 
* Added xml documentation 
* HistogramResultsAggregator refactor: 
  - HistogramResultsAggregator now groups results by provided GroupBy Function 
  - Added: TimeHistogramResultsAggregator now aggregates by time like HistogramResultsAggregator used to before this change 
  - Added: ThreadHistogramResultsAggregator aggregates results by worker-thread id 

0.1.6.0 
* Refactored IThreadingStrategy and giving it more control. 
* Refactor in naming: 
  - DefaultResultsAggregator.cs => TotalsResultsAggregator.cs 
  - IncrementalThreading.cs => IncrementalThreadCount.cs 
  - SemiAutoThreading.cs => SemiAutoThreadCount.cs 
* Added new IThreadingStrategy 
  - IncrementalWorkingThreadCount (keeps fixed thread count, but gradually increases concurrent-working-thread count. Useful when one thread represents unique user in testing environment)
title: LoadRunner load test library
